response.overview: Chie is in a bad mood with her boyfriend. When she goes to the convenience store, she calls out to him, but he doesn't say anything.  On her way home from the convenience store, she hears something fall from somewhere. It was a piece of chalk. The chalk seems to be able to see what people are thinking as if it were a balloon.  Chie happens to see a girl who is about to commit suicide after being dumped by her boyfriend, and she quickly writes "I want to live" on the chalk. The girl's suicidal thoughts disappear and she walks away looking happy.
response.title: Fukidashi
